message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss selling this product to you. I think it could really benefit you. I'm initially offering it for $22,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm currently only able to offer $10,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is significantly below its value. I could consider letting it go for $19,000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still not able to meet it at $19,000. I would like to counteroffer at $14,000.
